entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
